section.title: File Type - xct
section.p: The terrain file (extension .dat) is a raster digital elevation model represented as an array of elevations in meters on a latitude/longitude grid. The format used is unique to XCSoar as it contains a header containing the grid geometry followed by the raster array.
Terrain files for various regions can be obtained from the XCSoar website. Additional terrain files can be produced upon request.
